title.rendered: Magical Festive Season at the Esplanade

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

Sumptuous Advent offer, fairytale Christmas and gala New Year’s Eve 2023 

 

This Advent, experience exceptional culinary stories, the smell of cinnamon, sparkling bubbles of pure pleasure and the sweetest cookies in town, which simply invite mingling and fun.

 

Abandon yourself to the magical atmosphere and conclude a winter stroll along Zagreb’s picturesque streets with a sumptuous winter cocktails, excellent coffee, or an aromatic mulled wine at the Esplanade 1925 Lounge & Cocktail Bar, with magnificent views of Zagreb.

 

Gather the family at the traditional Advent Brunch at Zinfandel’s or toast to the holidays in the chic holiday vibe of Le Bistro, with cod dishes and various Christmas sweets. Continue relishing sweet Esplanade flavours in the warmth of your own home with the stylishly wrapped Esplanade Christmas cake. Spend Christmas Day in the company of your loved ones with a traditional Christmas lunch at Zinfandel’s, where you can expect a selection of tempting holiday specialties, as well as a generally magical ambience with piano music in the background, all making this Christmas truly special. If you plan to stay at home on Christmas day, we suggest you order Esplanade’s famous Turkey2Go with delicious condiments, hot and ready to be eaten.

 

For the craziest night of the year, throw on your most glamorous dress or your favourite suit and join the most glamorous celebration in the city. The New Year’s vibe of the magnificent Emerald Ballroom with live dance music and the classy Zinfandel’s gala dinner with live broadcast, a red carpet, premium welcome sparkling wine, a gourmet six-course dinner, sparkling midnight toast, celebration props – all this will guarantee you an amazing time and the best way to ring in the year 2023. While you’re enjoying yourself, your kids can have their own organised programme with the children’s New Year, run by professional animators. Cheerful games and lots of dancing are the best way for your youngest to welcome the New Year.

 

Get up to 20% off on accommodation during Advent with the Advance Purchase offer:
• Book now!

 

Check out the holiday offer:
• Sparkling Holidays at the Esplanade 2022

 

Festive Season Menus:
• Advent at Le Bistro
• Advent at Esplanade 1925 Lounge & Cocktail Bar
• Christmas Eve at Zinfandel’s
• Christmas Lunch at Zinfandel’s
• New Year’s Eve at Emerald Ballroom and Zinfandel’s

 

Contact:
T. +385 (0)1 4566 035
E. xmas@esplanade.hr
